title: Student Privacy Protection Strategies in Higher Education Mathematics Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical theories and basic experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Privacy-protecting design framework implementation for smartphone-centric limited-technology mathematical projects targeting graduate students in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can minimize the scope of student data collection by applying an ethical design framework during project design.
Learners can identify at least three technical measures for protecting personal information when using online collaboration tools.
Learners can establish and apply anonymization standards when publicly sharing mathematics project outputs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
